title: Hollyoaks heartbreak as stunt sees deadly disaster hit the village in crane collapse
text:

Hollyoaks airs its big stunt next week, as disaster hits the village with lives on the line.

Characters including Darren and Nancy Osborne, Cindy Cunningham, Scott Drinkwell and Mitchell Deveraux are caught up in horror as a crane collapses - with tunnels running underneath the village also appearing to cave in.

Cindy is desperate for her big business plans for the village to go ahead, ignoring health and safety advice about the tunnels.

Jake Quickenden's character builder Woody and his men bring in the diggers and equipment, unaware of the unfolding situation.

(Image: Channel 4)

But matters take a huge turn when a drunken Luke Morgan goes off the rails and jumps into the crane, trying to make it work.

Suddenly the arm of the crane, which is carrying huge steel beams, begins swinging across the village.

Those on the ground watch on in horror, as the beams begin to sway before dropping to the floor.

(Image: Channel 4)

(Image: Channel 4)

It's then that the crane itself begins to tilt towards the ground, after sinking into the tunnels, but will anyone pay the price?

Mitchell and Scott's drag alter-ego Anita end up trapped in the florist as the crane disaster unfolds around them, while viewers will have to see whether they get out in time.

Beneath the village, Darren and Nancy race into the tunnels that have begun to cave in after killer Breda crashes her car into one of the cranes - with the exes discovering little Ella and Charlie are down there.

(Image: Channel 4)

They themselves end up trapped as the village is evacuated, with pictures seeing them covered in dust and debris - will they survive, and where's Ella and Charlie?

Later on in the week, residents gather at the hospital in the fallout waiting for news on those injured.

The week ends with a special episode where secrets will be exposed and hearts will be broken.

Hollyoaks airs weeknights at 6:30pm on Channel 4, with the next episode at 7pm on E4.
description: Hollyoaks favourites will be left in grave danger next week, as building works in the village lead to a horror stunt
